ai.title: Build with AI
ai.createFromScratchDesc: Build a new automation project from the ground up
ai.newProjectDesc: Deploy, execute, and review the output of a simple Python project
ai.useTemplateDesc: Select from a collection of out of the box templates

websiteHealthMonitoring.title: Website Health Monitoring
websiteHealthMonitoring.text: Create an AutoKitteh website availability monitor that checks a configurable URL at a configurable interval (default 1 hour), tracks response time and HTTP status, and logs everything to Google Sheets. Send Slack alerts when the site goes down or recovers, including downtime duration. Also generate a 12-hour summary report twice daily showing uptime percentage, incident count, and average response time. Make the URL, check interval, Slack channel, spreadsheet ID, timeout, and expected status code configurable via environment variables.

releaseNotesAgent.title: Release Notes AI Agent
releaseNotesAgent.text: Create an AutoKitteh release notes generator that runs on a configurable schedule (default weekly on Sundays at 6 AM UTC). Fetch JIRA tickets from a configurable filter, categorize them into features and bug fixes based on issue type, and generate 2-3 sentence AI summaries for each ticket using ChatGPT. Create a formatted Confluence page with structured sections showing ticket links and AI descriptions, then send an email notification with the page URL and summary statistics. Make the JIRA filter ID, Confluence space key, parent page ID, notification email, schedule, JIRA server URL, and Confluence server URL configurable via environment variables.

webhookToLinearTicket.title: Webhook to Linear Ticket
webhookToLinearTicket.text: On webhook containing json with "title" and "description" create a ticket in linear

telegramTranslatorAgent.title: Telegram Translator Agent
telegramTranslatorAgent.text: Create an AutoKitteh Telegram bot that provides intelligent, context-aware translations using Gemini AI. The bot should handle /translate and /detect commands to translate text while preserving tone and explaining cultural nuances. Support automatic source language detection and provide a /help command. Use a connection trigger to listen for Telegram messages, process translation requests through Gemini with context-aware prompts, and send formatted responses back to the user.

redditTrackerAgent.title: Reddit Tracker Agent
redditTrackerAgent.text: Create an AutoKitteh project that monitors Reddit hourly for marketing opportunities in configurable subreddits. Use two-stage ChatGPT analysis: quick title check, then full content analysis with summary generation for matches. Analyze top-level comments on relevant posts for AutoKitteh engagement opportunities and generate suggested responses. Send Slack notifications for relevant posts and comments. Track all processed items in Google Sheets (separate Posts and Comments tabs) to prevent duplicates. Include retry logic with exponential backoff for Reddit rate limiting and API failures. All settings (subreddits, topics, channels, limits, Sheet ID, retry config) configurable via environment variables. Requires Reddit, ChatGPT, Slack, and Google Sheets connections.

hackerNewsTrackerAgent.title: Hacker News Tracker Agent
hackerNewsTrackerAgent.text: Create an AutoKitteh project that monitors Hacker News hourly for posts and comments matching configurable topics (automation, workflow orchestration, durable execution, etc.). Use ChatGPT to analyze relevance and generate summaries. Send Slack notifications for matches. Analyze comments on matched posts for AutoKitteh engagement opportunities. Track all processed items in Google Sheets to prevent duplicates, with early stopping after consecutive seen posts. Include configurable rate limits, retry logic with exponential backoff, and error notifications. All settings (topics, channels, limits, Sheet ID) configurable via environment variables. Requires Slack, ChatGPT, and Google Sheets connections.

githubToSlack.title: GitHub to Slack
githubToSlack.text: On new PR create send a slack message to a channel provided in configuration. Put the title, time and description in the message. Format the message as you like.

youtubeChannelMonitor.title: YouTube Channel Monitor
youtubeChannelMonitor.text: Create an AutoKitteh YouTube video monitor that polls a specified YouTube channel on a configurable schedule (default every 5 minutes) to detect new video uploads and sends Slack notifications with video details. Use AutoKitteh store to track the last checked timestamp between runs to avoid duplicate notifications. Fetch videos using the YouTube Data API, compare timestamps against stored state, and send formatted Slack messages with video title, URL, and metadata for any new uploads found. Make the YouTube channel name, Slack channel, and polling interval configurable via environment variables.

aiInboxAssistant.title: AI Inbox Assistant
aiInboxAssistant.text: Create an AutoKitteh workflow that triggers on new Gmail messages. Extract the email subject and body, and use ChatGPT to analyze whether it's a personal, work or spam. If ChatGPT determines it's a personal email, send an automated Gmail reply "I'll get back to you ASAP", if it's work related, post a notification to a configurable Slack channel with the email details including sender, subject, and AI analysis. Make the Slack channel configurable.

dailyWeatherAlert.title: Daily Weather Alert
dailyWeatherAlert.text: This AutoKitteh project automatically monitors weather conditions in San Francisco every day at 8:00 AM local time. When there's a 20% or higher chance of precipitation, it sends an gmail alert through Gmail to notify you about potential rain.

whatsappFoodTrackingBot.title: WhatsApp Food Tracking Bot
whatsappFoodTrackingBot.text: Create an AutoKitteh WhatsApp chatbot that helps users track carbohydrate content in food using the USDA FoodData Central SR Legacy dataset. When a WhatsApp message is received via Twilio webhook, use Claude AI with tool calling to parse the food description, search a preloaded USDA food database with fuzzy matching, and calculate carbs based on portions. Support multi-turn conversations to clarify ambiguous foods or portion sizes. Load and index the USDA SR Legacy CSV data at startup, implement fuzzy search for food matching, and respond via Twilio with formatted carb information. Make the Twilio phone number and database path configurable via environment variables.
